name: T.H.Shevchenko
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to Taras Shevchenko, the outstanding Ukrainian poet, artist and thinker (1814-1861).
averseDescription: On the coin obverse there is the Small State Emblem of Ukraine in the middle of the beads circumference decoration, framed with guelder-rose sprays. Above the State Emblem there is the year of issue - 1996. Around the coin circumference there are inscriptions: УКРАЇНА - above and 200 ГРИВЕНЬ - underneath in two lines
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse in the centre there is a portrait of T.H.Shevchenko with a poet`s autograph under it. Near the portrait there is a singing Kobzar with a guide boy near a village house. Above, around the coin circumference there is an inscription: Т.Г.ШЕВЧЕНКО 1814-1861, underneath there are designations of Аu 900 and 15,55, coin`s pure weight.
